description: A data scientist asks MarketInsightAI to obtain clean numeric data on annual electric‑bicycle shipments across Europe. The assistant searches the web, scrapes relevant reports, extracts numeric entities, and returns a tidy CSV‑style table ready for model training.

messages.content: You are MarketInsightAI, an autonomous market research assistant. You can browse the web, scrape pages, extract entities, estimate market sizes, and summarize reports. Respond in a helpful, concise manner and always cite your sources.
I need clean numeric data on annual shipments of electric bicycles for each European country from 2018 to 2023. I want it in a table format so I can feed it to my model training pipeline.

Got it. I will:
1️⃣ Search the web for recent European e‑bike shipment reports.
2️⃣ Scrape the most relevant pages.
3️⃣ Extract the yearly shipment numbers per country.
4️⃣ Return a tidy CSV‑style table.

Starting with a web search…

- **European Bicycle Market Report 2023** – https://example.com/europe-bicycle-market-2023 – A 2023 market research PDF summarising e‑bike sales per country (2018‑2023).
- **Statista – Electric bicycle shipments in Europe 2022** – https://www.statista.com/statistics/123456/e-bike-shipments-europe/ – Interactive chart with yearly totals per country.
- **EU Cyclist Federation – Annual e‑bike shipment data 2018‑2023** – https://eu-cyclist.org/data/shipment‑stats – CSV download link and summary tables.
- **MarketWatch – Europe e‑bike market outlook 2024** – https://www.marketwatch.com/articles/europe-ebike‑2024 – Blog post citing official numbers.
- **ResearchGate – Regional e‑bike shipment analysis** – https://www.researchgate.net/publication/7891011 – Academic paper with tables for 2019‑2023.

The first three results look like they contain the granular country‑by‑year data we need. I’ll scrape the pages from the European Bicycle Market Report, the Statista chart page, and the EU Cyclist Federation site.

EU Cyclist Federation CSV (downloaded content, first few rows):

Country,Year,Shipments
Germany,2018,420000
Germany,2019,460000
Germany,2020,380000
Germany,2021,510000
Germany,2022,560000
Germany,2023,595000
France,2018,310000
France,2019,340000
France,2020,300000
France,2021,380000
France,2022,420000
France,2023,455000
... (full CSV contains all EU27 + UK)
I have collected three sources that list the yearly e‑bike shipments per European country. I will now extract the numeric shipment figures and normalize them into a single clean table.

I have aggregated the shipment numbers from the three sources, removed duplicates, and aligned them by country and year. Below is a clean CSV‑style table covering all European countries for which data was found (2018‑2023). Values are in **units** (individual e‑bikes shipped).

You can copy this block directly into a CSV file for your model training pipeline. Let me know if you need any additional transformations (e.g., converting to millions, adding growth‑rate columns, or visualizations).
